snippet: HALLET--Louise, 96, of Cherry Hill, NJ formerly of Roslyn, NY passed away peacefully surrounded by her loving family. Beloved wife of the late Herman Hallet. Devoted mother of Harriet Shanzer, Jeff Hallet, Laurie Stahl. Beloved grandmother of six and great-grandmother of eight. 1/3
lead_paragraph: HALLET--Louise, 96, of Cherry Hill, NJ formerly of Roslyn, NY passed away peacefully surrounded by her loving family. Beloved wife of the late Herman Hallet. Devoted mother of Harriet Shanzer, Jeff Hallet, Laurie Stahl. Beloved grandmother of six and great-grandmother of eight. 1/3
